attributes.action: Don’t raise the national insurance for those in social care and low paid incomes
attributes.additional_details: I want you to understand that this is beyond unfair all the rich and those earning massive wages wouldn’t be here without us lower class and now more money is being robbed of us!! You need to take the money from the rich not the poor or numbers will increase on suicide, mental health, homelessness, debt and many other horrific things will happen.
attributes.background: I want YOU to understand us on low paid incomes can barely afford to live on minimum wage. Sometimes a week or days without food and now the ni is being raised there no chance for those of low incomes who work so hard to the point of getting unwell! I also work as a carer which is very unaprciated!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Limit National Insurance increases to high earners
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596280
